mapper.select:
SELECT doi.order_no, dps.product_name, dau.user_name, doi.total_buy_count, dod.sku_rate, dod.pay_money, dabd.`name`, doi.total_freight, doi.receiver_name, doi.receiver_phone, doi.receiver_province, doi.receiver_city, doi.receiver_county, doi.receiver_detail, doi.create_time, doi.pay_time, doi.order_status FROM djmall_order_info doi LEFT JOIN djmall_product_spu dps ON doi.product_id = dps.id LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_user dau ON dau.id = doi.business_id LEFT JOIN djmall_order_detail dod ON dod.child_order_no = doi.order_no LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_base_data dabd ON doi.pay_type = dabd.`code`
doi.business_id = #{userId}
